amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-253 to expand from 60 days before an election to 90 days the provisions on knowingly prohibiting deceptive practices in federal elections, including knowingly providing false information about the time or place of voting, qualifications for voting, or public endorsements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherrill amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Sherrill.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sherrill amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
